title: Ticket #3541: Error code E_HTTP_RESPONSE_NOT_200 needs error message.
description:
It is possible for the EC2 GAHP to return E_HTTP_RESPONSE_NOT_200 without a corresponding error message, if the HTTP error precluded a body (e.g., 414, 'URI too long'). Since the error message is copied into the hold message, this is at best a suboptimal situation.

Resolution: check where E_HTTP_RESPONSE_NOT_200 is generated and insert a message repeating the code.

TO-DO: Find someone with a lot of spare time or an existing HTTP error-code to HTTP error-name table.
remarks:
Karen is setting this ticket back to docpending, so that its doc will be properly completed before release of 7.9.6. The version history item was committed on master branch after the 7.9.6 branch was created. So, the item does not yet appear in the 7.9.6 manual. Karen will do what is needed to put the version history item into the V7_9_6-branch.

2013-May-03 14:43:22 by tlmiller:
'git branch --contains' reports that this commit is only on the master, and not in the 7.9.6 branch, as I thought. I've changed the "fixed in" item to 7.9.7, although it probably should really be 8.1.0. This means that the version history item was in the wrong place. :(

2013-May-06 13:27:31 by johnkn:
this will be in 8.0 not 8.1 tj
